thread.title: Celebrate with Graphic Designer Deidra Deandra!
thread.title_full: Celebrate with Graphic Designer Deidra Deandra!

author: Belize Hub
title: Celebrate with Graphic Designer Deidra Deandra!
text:
About Belize , People and Culture | August 3, 2015 by Belize Hub + | 0 Comments 
Deidra Deandra is celebrating it’s first year of successful business in Belize ! Located in the capital city (Belmopan) Deidra Deandra – a Belize Graphic Design Company – has offered creative graphic design services to locals for the past year. The company has grown in it’s short lifetime to reach international markets and receives business from various customers in the US. 
This coming year, Deidra Deandra preparing to expand it’s services to develop a print branch. Through this new service, Deidra Deandra hopes to partner with many more organizations to help take your ideas from the initial design stage to the final tangible product. This is a big step for the company and Deidra Deandra invites you to stay connected as it grows to better serve you. 
To celebrate (yes!!!) Deidra Deandra is having a special giveaway! You can win a Photo Shoot with Belmopan’s Best – Monica Gallardo Photography ! Deidra Deandra has partnered with this well known photographer to give you the chance to win a session in Belmopan, Belize. (It gets better!) Bring along your family or a group of friends to share in this session with you! After all, photos are always better with a few more happy faces in them! 
Visit this link to WIN: http://goo.gl/RA9i5A
